metadata.title: CVE-2019-8943 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: WordPress through 5.0.3 allows Path Traversal in wp_crop_image(). An attacker (who has privileges to crop an image) can write the output image to an arbitrary directory via a filename containing two image extensions and ../ sequences, such as a filename ending with the .jpg?/../../file.jpg substring.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
